title: Elegant Diamond Dangler Bangle
features: This contemporary bangle features a series of geometric, kite-shaped gold dangles interspersed with sparkling diamond rondelles. The matte finish on the gold provides a sophisticated contrast to the brilliance of the diamonds. The flexible design ensures a comfortable and secure fit. Crafted with precision in the renowned Hyderabadi style.
colors: Warm yellow gold and bright white diamonds.
occasions: or as a stylish everyday accessory. Also
perfect for modern South Indian weddings or festive occasions where you want to blend tradition with a modern aesthetic.
